TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PipeReader extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义提供对管道读取端的访问权限的类。

span.span: Defines a class that provides access to a read side of pipe.

summary.span: 将管道的读取光标向前移动到已使用的数据之后。

span.span: Moves forward the pipeline's read cursor to after the consumed data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的数据的内存将被释放，并且不再可用。The memory for the consumed data will be released and no longer available. 此调用后，不能访问之前从 返回的 。The previously returned from must not be accessed after this call. 检查的数据应告知更多的可用数据。The examined data communicates to the pipeline when it should signal more data is available.

summary.span: 将管道的读取光标向前移动到已使用的数据之后，将数据标记为“已处理”。

span.span: Moves forward the pipeline's read cursor to after the consumed data, marking the data as processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的数据的内存将被释放，并且不再可用。The memory for the consumed data will be released and no longer available. 此调用后，不能访问之前从 返回的 。The previously returned from must not be accessed after this call. 检查的数据应告知更多的可用数据。The examined data communicates to the pipeline when it should signal more data is available.

param.span: 标记已成功处理的数据范围。

span.span: Marks the extent of the data that has been successfully processed.

param.name: examined
param.span: 标记已读取并检查的数据范围。

span.span: Marks the extent of the data that has been read and examined.

summary.span: 将管道的读取光标向前移动到已使用的数据之后，将数据标记为“已处理”、“已读取”和“已检查”。

span.span: Moves forward the pipeline's read cursor to after the consumed data, marking the data as processed, read and examined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的数据的内存将被释放，并且不再可用。The memory for the consumed data will be released and no longer available. 此调用后，不能访问之前从 返回的 。The previously returned from must not be accessed after this call. 检查的数据应告知更多的可用数据。The examined data communicates to the pipeline when it should signal more data is available.
